title: PBE won't launch
body:
When i run both programs(lol.launcher & lol.launcher.admin) all it does is showing me the league of legends logo and disappear with no trace left.
except the lock file that appear for a second and disappear just like the logo.

replies.body: Ahhhh most likely your PBE version of League hasn't had permissions set up to allow the client to launch successfully. It should be pretty easy to fix up either by only running one of the League client's at once, but also make sure to run through our [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for steps on how to adjust those settings as well!

Even when i only launch one of them it doesn't work
The permissions guide only helped with my windows update
Oh and the lockfile still appear and disappear
https://prnt.sc/gs49y2

Make sure you went through every step in that guide and not just the one on updating windows. If it still doesn't help at all, hit up our tech experts in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can take a closer look at your system to see what's going wrong.
